Rotations
Transforms

The following joints use specific rotations matrices which implement the method recommended in Featherstone's Book Appendix.2. More...

Collaboration diagram for Rotations:

The following joints use specific rotations matrices which implement the method recommended in Featherstone's Book Appendix.2.

  • RevoluteAxisXJoint : Implements specific rotation around x-axis.

  • RevoluteAxisYJoint : Implements specific rotation around y-axis.

  • RevoluteAxisXJoint : Implements specific rotation around z-axis.
